sentences.cn: “ 要找到他在哪里吗, 呃?

sentences.en: Atlanta was voted the best city in which to locate a business by more than 400 chief executives.
sentences.cn: 逾400名行政总裁投票推选亚特兰大为最适宜开办公司的城市。

sentences.en: He requested help from the librarian to locate the book he wanted.
sentences.cn: 他请求图书管理员帮助找出他要找的书的位置.

sentences.en: It is a serious mistake to locate an orchard improperly.
sentences.cn: 果园的位置选择不当,会引起严重的恶果.

sentences.en: Large retail chains are usually only prepared to locate stores in areas of high population density.
sentences.cn: 大型零售连锁店一般只愿意开在人口密集的地区。

sentences.en: The business is located right in the center of town.
The general tried to locate the enemy's site.
sentences.cn: 那位将军想找出敌人营地的位置。

sentences.en: The head company decided to locate in Qingdao.
The police car sped away, but failed to locate Georgos.
sentences.cn: 警车飞驶而去, 但未能找着乔戈斯的下落.

sentences.en: The scientists want to locate the position of the gene on a chromosome.
sentences.cn: 科学家们想找到该基因在染色体上的位置。

sentences.en: There have been many attempts, both light-hearted and serious, to locate the Loch Ness Monster.
sentences.cn: 有很多人或随意或认真地尝试过，想要找到尼斯湖水怪。

sentences.en: They decided to locate a new school in the suburbs.
sentences.cn: 他们决定在郊区设置一所新学校.

sentences.en: Through the instrumentality of the police he was able to locate his relatives.
sentences.cn: 靠警察帮忙,他找到了他的亲属.

sentences.en: To locate an extremum we look for these points.
sentences.cn: 为了确定极值,我们需要找这些点.

sentences.en: Try to locate exactly where the smells are entering the room.
sentences.cn: 找找看气味具体是从什么地方散入房间的。

sentences.en: Tudor Court represents your opportunity to locate at the heart of the new Birmingham.
sentences.cn: 都铎宛，您在新伯明翰中心区置业的好机会。

sentences.en: We can locate the true depth of burial at the value.
sentences.cn: 我们能够算出这个值上的真实埋藏深度.

sentences.en: We couldn’t locate the source of the radio signal.
sentences.cn: 我们无法确定无线电信号的来源。

sentences.en: We've simply been unable to locate him.
sentences.cn: 我们就是没办法找到他。

words.tran_cn: 局部的；地区的；小范围的
位置（形容词locational）；地点；外景拍摄场地
使地方化；定位；局限（localise的过去分词）
找出；安置；确定…的位置（locate的ing形式）

phrases.tran_cn: 在某一点设置；在…定居；坐落于

trans.tran_cn: 找到，探明，确定…的位置，放置，设立，建立，创办于
trans.tran_en: to be in a particular position or place
to be in a particular position or place
